name: 黃士嘉
objective:
Application Program Design with Embedded Devices
1. Java Programming Languages and Android Embedded Systems
2. The developing steps for Application Programs
3. Analysis on developing steps for Application Programs
4. The developing Models
5. Data Flow Diagram
6. System FlowChart
7. Applicaton Program Design
8. Introduction to Database system
9. Using SQL
10.The Skills for developing application programs
11.Debugging your program
12.Version Control Tools
13.Conclusion & Demo
schedule:
1. Programming Languages and evolution (1 week)
2. The developing steps for Application Programs (1 week)
3. Analysis on developing steps for Application Programs (1 week)
4. The developing Models (1 week)
5. Data Flow Diagram (1 week)
6. System FlowChart (1 week)
7. Applicaton Program Design (1 week)
8. Introduction to Database system (1 week)
9. Using SQL (1 week)
10.The Skills for developing application programs (1 week)
11.Debugging your program (1 week)
12.Version Control Tools (1 week)
13.Conclusion & Demo (4 weeks)
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG10：減少不平等（Reduced Inequalities）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
